biotools.summary: APOD (Accurate Predictor Of Disordered flexible linkers) is an accurate sequence-based predictor of disordered flexible linkers. It utilizes both local- and protein-level inputs that quantify propensity for disorder, sequence composition, sequence conservation and selected putative structural properties.
